content: छेदः [छिद् भावे घञ् अच् वा] {@--1@} Cutting, felling down, breaking down, dividing; अभिज्ञाश्छेदपातानां क्रियंते नंदनद्रुमाः <ls>Ku. 2. 41</ls>; छेदो दंशस्य दाहो वा <ls>M. 4. 4</ls>; <ls>R. 14. 1</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 270</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">370</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 223</ls>, <ls n="Y. 2.">240.</ls> {@--2@} Solving, removing, dissipating, clearing; as in संशयच्छेद. {@--3@} Destruction, interruption; निद्राच्छेदाभिताम्रा <ls>Mu. 3. 21.</ls> {@--4@} Cessation, end, termination, disappearance as in घर्मच्छेद <ls>Ś. 2. 5.</ls> {@--5@} A distinguishing mark. {@--6@} A cut, an incision, cleft. {@--7@} Deprivation, want, deficiency. {@--8@} Failure; संततिच्छेद <ls>Ś. 6.</ls> {@--9@} A piece, bit, cut, fragment, section; बिसकिसलयच्छेदपाथेयवंतः <ls>Me. 11</ls>, <ls n="Me.">59</ls>; अभिनवकरिदंतच्छदपांडुः कपोलः <ls>Māl. 1. 22</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 4</ls>; <ls>Ś. 3. 6</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 100.</ls> {@--10@} (In math.) A divisor, the denominator of a fraction.
